nodes.text: The husband of Bahlea was a Twi'lek male who was a member of the Pilgrims on the planet Tython. The father of Rusa, Bahlea's husband went in search of manka cat teeth in hopes of healing his ailing daughter, but he was killed by Flesh Raiders.
According to the conversation files for Star Wars: The Old Republic, Bahlea's husband was originally planned to be a Mirialan.
